Description:
Walk To Lake Weeroona!
A perfect opportunity awaits in this wonderfully presented modern home set in a tranquil street that's opposite lovely bushlands and the Bendigo Creek, perfect for dog walks and ideal for families. You're also walking distance to our beautiful Lake Weeroona.
This brilliant floor plan is so well thought out and offers lovely wide hallways and expansive living spaces that make the home feel ever so bright and open.
At the front of the home is the first of two living areas perfect for all your family's cinema needs or simply a front sitting room for the adults.
Central to the home is the large open plan kitchen, meals and second living space that also opens up to the glorious alfresco area.
The kitchen hosts quality stainless steel appliances including a 5-burner gas cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher, pantry and loads of benchtop space which will tick all boxes for the chef of the family.
The four bedrooms are all of good size and have built-in robes. The main bedroom at the rear of the home has views of the lush garden outside and hosts both walk in robe and your own personal ensuite.
Outside you're hit with immaculately landscaped gardens and super lush green grass, perfect for the kids to run around this summer. There's also a brilliant undercover alfresco area that leads directly into the kitchen/main living so you can enjoy outdoor dining.
The other added features to the home include:
Ducted heating and cooling throughout the home, a sizable laundry with access straight out to the yard, lots of linen presses and storage spaces throughout the home and a double remote lock-up garage.
Located in a quiet leafy street and just a stone's throw to Lake Weeroona and Bendigo's CBD you will love being able to walk to some of Bendigo's best cafes. The kids will also have a short walk to school with Weeroona College less than 2km away.
This home will suit every buyer - whether you are looking for a family home in a central location, if you're an investor or a first home buyer. Do not miss the first open home.
Insights: 44 The Boulevard, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Sensational Starter
This 60's weatherboard home in a quiet residential street is the perfect first home or investment offering character and charm with the benefit of a complete renovation only a handful of years ago.
Features 3 bedrooms, all with built-in robes and ceiling fans, 3 piece bathroom with tile-base shower, spacious lounge plus second living area, fully appointed modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including double oven, separate laundry & toilet and a large entertainers deck overlooking the sizeable rear yard.
Set on a level block measuring approximately 732 square meters and with a 6m x 4m shed.
Ideally situated off Cahill Street in White Hills, minutes from shops, schools, public transport, CBD and Lake Weeroona. A great place to call home!

Description:
Brings a smile to your face. Accommodating 2 bedroom unit
Twelve solar panels providing 3.2 kilowatts power set this unit apart from the rest. With Lake Weeroona and several other walking tracks close by, location opposite Weeroona Oval 1 km from the CBD and easy access to the new Hospital and professional facilities, this property offers the opportunity for a great work/life balance. An entryway sits adjacent to a sizeable lounge complete with gas furnace and wall mounted air con. With new floor and window furnishings throughout, an original timber kitchen, a three piece bathroom and separate toilet as well as fresh paint throughout make for a low maintenance amenable property. Complemented by a spacious rear yard, a single garage and a bullnose verandah overlooking the front yard with two mature trees which give extra privacy in a quiet spot known for its neighbourly atmosphere. Public transport 50 metres away. Current tenants pay $275 pw on a periodic lease. Property can be sold with vacant possession.

Description:
Relax and Retire in Style
Quality built and with low maintenance living in mind, this elegant home offers plenty for those looking to downsize and enjoy an easy carefree lifestyle. Situated in popular White Hills nearby to the Botanic Gardens this independent design offers the best of modern living with 3 generous bedrooms including ensuite and WIR off master. The ensuite features his and her vanity plus an oversized shower. The home features 2 living areas including separate formal lounge and a fully appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances. The kitchen and family area overlooks the picturesque rear yard which features a large entertaining area and a custom workshop for those who like to tinker.
Set on the high side of the street the property has been meticulously landscaped and features a generous mix of establish plants, trees and lawn area.
Why build when this turn-key property is ready for you to simply move in and enjoy.

Description:
Perfectly Placed for family pleasure
A masterful combination of space and light dominates this 4 bedroom, family-friendly residence in popular Peppercorns Estate.
Luxury everywhere over single level living will allow you to enjoy all the 3 living spaces this floorplan offers, including neutral toned decor with an impressive introduction.
The main bedroom is a huge area with walk-in robe and ensuite, plus there is a sitting room to the front as well as the study.
The huge open living area includes kitchen, meals and family room, overlooking the outside entertaining area. To the rear, the 3rd living takes in the secured backyard.
Kitchen with stone benches, walk-in pantry, 900mm appliances, dishwasher and loads of storage.
Ducted heating and cooling provide year-round comfort.
Outside is a double garage with internal access, and side gate to concrete pad to accommodate caravan and secondary vehicle.
Aggregate drives and paths are to the front.
The huge (approx. 4m x 11m) shed has concrete flooring and power.
Also 5kw solar system with 25 panels.
All this and so close to walking tracks, Lake Weeroona, schools, CBD and new hospital.
With so much more to see, make sure you tick this one on the list to inspect.
Insights: 8 Ruby Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
DESIGNED FOR PERFECT LIVING
Exuding street presence this well designed home is great for the family being loaded with extras & options to enhance your lifestyle. Creating a beautiful ambiance, the radiant light filled open living area links with the adjoining dining space & stunning fully equipped designer kitchen to create an expansive communal setting. With formal lounge & 4 spacious bedrooms including main with WIR and ensuite. The family bathroom has large shower, vanity and separate bath plus there's a separate toilet. A host of extras include ducted evaporate cooling and gas central heating, quality light fittings and floor coverings with plenty of storage throughout. Secure garaging for 2 cars with direct entry inside the home for added security. A great spot to enjoy lazy sunny afternoons, the covered outdoor alfresco area overlooks the easy care back garden with double gate access. Enjoy everything White Hills has to offer including close proximity to Lake Weeroona, Bendigo Hospital and short distance to Bendigo's CBD. The whole family will fall in love with this home.
Note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT INSPECTIONS

Description:
SOLID & AFFORDABLE
Tucked away in the quiet back streets of popular White Hills is this solid and affordable brick veneer home, located conveniently on the fringe of the Bendigo central township and close to schools, Lake Weeroona and sporting grounds alike. Representing the very definition of a terrific set and forget investment or affordable first home or low maintenance residence, the home is in good order throughout ensuring that it is comfortable to live/rent in as is, or you have the choice to update cosmetically over time
Brand new freshly laid carpet is evident throughout as soon as you enter the home. There are three carpeted bedrooms, two with built in robes and the master with walk in robe and its own ensuite. The central family bathroom lies at the rear convenient to the two remaining bedrooms, as does the large laundry. The open plan section of the home consists of the lounge, meals and kitchen areas. The lounge is carpeted and has gas heating and a split system unit, with a generous meals are at the end. The kitchen is original, but is functional and more than serviceable for now until you decide to update. Cooking is via gas appliances, and there is ample cupboard space.
Outside, the property is set on a easy care allotment of approx 671m2, with room to grow your garden ideas. There is plenty of space for the kids or pets to run around in the private and fully enclosed rear yard. A shaded patio is a great spot for a bbq, and the shed has roller door access, concrete floor and power, plus a separate room at the back. At the front is a double carport and shady veranda to complete this tidy package.
This affordable home would suit a range of buyers, including first home buyers, investors and renovators! All the key ingredients are here to move in and enjoy, with options aplenty for down the track!

Description:
Develop or Move right in.
Opportunity plus!
Move straight in to this fully renovated 3 Bedroom home or perfect for the developer to build on the remaining land (STCA)
The existing residence comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in Robes and Ceiling fans. Open plan kitchen and lounge area both with reverse cycle Heating and Cooling.
Large bathroom includes double vanity sink, bath and large 1200 x 900 shower. The toilet is seperate from the bathroom with it's own vanity.
Yard is small and low maintenance.
New carpet, tiling and painting throughout the entire property leave nothing left to do except move in or Rent out. Currently let at $310 pw.
As your own home this house won't dissapoint as a rental property you have guaranteed income given the properties close proximity to Schools, Playgrounds, CBD and Bendigo Hospital District.
For the developer the hard work has been done for you with Surveying of the land completed and draft plans for 2 x Two storey townhouses already drawn up. STCA this land opportunity offers the potential for a significant return on investment for any developer.
Inspection available by appointment.
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 18276

Description:
MODERN LIVING IN QUIET LOCATION
This beautifully presented home is located in a quiet cul-de-sac only minutes to the new Bendigo Hospital, Lake Weeroona and Bendigo's CBD. With a floor plan that is suitable to a variety of family lifestyles, this outstanding home will surely impress. Comprising 3 bedrooms, walk in robe and ensuite to main and built-in robes to the other 2 bedrooms, ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling for year-round comfort. Formal lounge, plus an open plan kitchen/meals/family area. The kitchen is well appointed with stainless steel appliances and plenty of bench and cupboard space overlooking the family/dining. The large quality built outdoor pergola is an entertainer's dream all set amongst a private and tranquil setting making this ideal for sitting back while watching children play. Many other features include direct access to the home via double garage, fully landscaped enclosed yard with side access for trailers, boats or caravan. There is literally nothing to do, other than move in and relax.

Description:
Outstanding Potential in an Exclusive Location
This home stands in an unbeatable location, walking distance to the lovely Lake Weeroona and just a few short minutes to the CBD you really can't go wrong.
This cute weatherboard house sits on a 700m² allotment and comprises of three great sized bedrooms, a newly renovated bathroom, separate living area with a gas heater and split system, big kitchen and meals area, separate laundry with outdoor access, a fantastic sized yard and a whopping 10x7m Colorbond shed.
The home is excellent as is, yet scope to improve for all you reno-heads out there. With its sort after, central location you're sure to have a great result in a re-sell. Take advantage of the double street access or even subdivide STCA.
Ticking boxes for multiple buyers this property will not last long, enquire today and arrange an inspection.

Description:
Owner occupy or invest with confidence
Within close proximity of the hustle and bustle of the CBD, yet still far enough away to enjoy a quiet and tranquil lifestyle you will find this three bedroom property.
Upon entry you are greeted by wide open spaces and your mind will run wild with ways to add your own personal stamp to the home. A lounge room can be found on the left and is of ample size, evaporative cooling and wall furnace heating are located here and provide the firepower required to keep the whole property appropriately controlled at all times. A Kitchen and dining area can be found moving forward from here. The kitchen is well equipped with an abundance of storage and well maintained appliances.
Turning right upon entry will take you to the living quarters of the home. Which contains Three Bedrooms, two of which containing Built in Robes. A laundry and a central bathroom, with recently completed minor renovation work and equipped with a bath.
Heading outside you will appreciate how the property is positioned on the approximately 730m2 block to offer substantial moving space, without becoming overwhelming with maintenance. With established garden/Greenery areas and a grass area so the kids can still run around at their own leisure! The front of the property has a single carport equipped at the front and offers privacy with most windows facing away from the street frontage.
Location is without a doubt a massive draw card for this property. Located within close proximity to public transport, quality schooling opportunities, Bendigo airport now offering travel from Bendigo to Sydney direct and less than 10 minutes away from the Bendigo CBD offering many shops and cafes to enjoy. This property tailors well to first home buyers, Downsizers, Investors alike and will be sure to tick all the boxes.
If this property is the one for you don't wait for the open for inspection - Call the team at Ray White Bendigo today!

Description:
Welcome home.
Located in a lovely quiet cul-de-sac is this free-flowing three-bedroom home. Situated just walking distance to the Botanical Gardens, White Hills Swimming Pool and a stone's throw to Holy Rosary Primary School.
Featuring three bedrooms, a large master with walk in robe and full ensuite, built in robes to the remaining two bedrooms with the main bathroom close by and an open plan kitchen/dining/living area completing the floorplan.
The functional kitchen is finished in a timeless colour palette and includes a stainless-steel gas cooktop and electric oven, dishwasher, large pantry. The adjoining living area is perfect for casual family living and enjoys direct access to a low maintenance outdoor area.
Externally, the home offers a neat and tidy garden and a double lock-up garage.
Other inclusions are ducted heating, split system cooling in the main living area, built-in robes in the remaining two bedrooms, efficient European style laundry.
This property is situated in the ideal location for First Home Buyers. Alternatively, the savvy Investor will appreciate the location with an expected rental return of $320 per week and plenty of demand from tenants.

Description:
Edwardian charm with modern updates.
Modern styles come and go but genuine period homes are forever as "Ellesmere", a first class Edwardian home proves.
Built circa 1900 and charmed with period features, a recent renovation and redecoration has taken it from old and dated to a stylish and elegant 21st century home.
External features include return verandah with turned verandah posts, simple timber balustrade and decorative frieze, detailed barge boards with finial and a sun canopy over the front window.
Inside, it boasts spinal hallway with feature arch, 3.6m pine-lined ceilings throughout living areas, polished timber floors and lead-light glazed windows to mention a few.
Accommodation consists of three larger-than average bedrooms, all with open fireplaces adorned with timber over mantles and built-in robes.
Two have decorative ceilings and cornice while the main includes a sweet window seat overlooking the front verandah.
The lounge is a snug and stylish space opening to spacious living/dining areas with access from both the return verandah and through French doors to the rear verandah/alfresco deck.
Modern kitchens and bathrooms are essential ingredients for today's lifestyle and these do not disappoint.
The country-style kitchen is equipped with a gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher, pantry cupboard and island breakfast bar while the totally revamped bathroom has timber vanity, shower, WC and freestanding, claw-foot slipper-style bathtub made for long relaxing soaks.
Large, storage-rich laundry, second WC with shower, central heating and reverse cycle air conditioning complete the internal picture.
Outside, the manicured front garden features a traditional picket fence with standard roses bordering brick pathways while the rear brick-paved courtyard has a studio/home office tucked in the corner and carport accessed via a private driveway off Grace Street.
Located close to Lake Weeroona, the CBD and public transport, this ageless property makes a fine family home but has recently served as boutique short-term accommodation offering buyers plenty of flexibility.
With an abundance of antique furniture, this property has potential plus for those looking to get into the furnished-accommodation/BNB market.
Contact Linda today to learn more about this striking property – 0438 381 900.

- Offering two separate living areas and ensuites on both levels
- Open plan living incorporating family room, study, dining and kitchen
- Master bedroom with ensuite and very large walk in robe. Each bedroom upstairs has a study nook
- Upstairs you have two bedrooms, separate living area, large walk in robes and two-way bathroom
- Excellent storage with 'Harry Potter Style' cupboard on each level, large storage and shelving unit in study
- BOSE surround system, Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, Solar power 2.0kw system
- Many features including polished timber floors, Bosch appliances, induction cooktop, double glazed windows etc
This beautiful home is very trendy and classy with great design and certainly great location. Only minutes to the CBD and a 100 metre stroll to the beautiful Botanic gardens. The garden has well established olive trees, lemon and lime trees, small vegetable plot and at the front stunning crepe myrtles pink when in flower. The home also has a lovely return verandah ideal for the bbq or entertaining.

Description:
NEAT & SOLID WITH GREAT YARD SPACE
Located in popular White Hills is this attractive cream brick residence that will ideally suit the home occupier or investor alike. Neat, solid and affordable, the home has seen some updates recently and is ready to move in or rent out straight away.
The interior has been freshly painted, boasting three carpeted bedrooms, the main has a large built in robe and there is a second a smaller fitted robe to bedroom two. A three piece bathroom is original and includes both shower and bath. The spacious central living room opens through double doors to the meals space and to the kitchen which offers gas cooking and plenty of cupboard and bench space. A reverse cycle ducted air-conditioner takes care of the heating and cooling. Making up the internal layout is the laundry and separate loo at the rear.
Occupying a manageable, low maintenance allotment of approx 593m2, it is well fenced and secure with enough room for kids and pets to thrive. The garage/shed is serviceable and has handy side access down the driveway and heaps of room for additional carports or shedding.
A terrific package close to the local White Hills shopping centre, Epsom supermarket, Botanical Gardens and schools. Not to mention a straight 5 minute drive to the city centre.

Description:
Why rent when you could own your own?
Brand new and ready to occupy, ths architect-designed, up-market townhouses is located in a very quiet complex in White Hills close to school, Bendigo Botanic Gardens and public transport.
Choose between two or three-bedroom design, both with the same quality inclusions and good storage options.
Featuring fabulous open-style living with study nook inside the front entry, light-filled living room with sliding door to the front, galley style kitchen equipped with big island bench for casual dining, stainless steel gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and pantry cupboard with a separate north-facing dining area opening to compact, fully-fenced yard.
Extras include bedrooms with built-in robes, split system heating/cooling 3-piece bathroom, cleverly concealed Euro laundry, quality window and floor coverings, direct access from the auto garage and low maintenance landscaping.
Why not realise your dream of home ownership with a brand-new townhouse?

Description:
IMMACULATE - POSITION IS EVERYTHING
This is an immaculate four year-old home in arguably the best location of White Hills. It's a compact 274m2 allotment being only metres from the Botanical Gardens, a short walk to shops, Bendigo Creek and transport. The home is kept beautifully inside and out with full landscaping and a minimal-maintenance yard including synthetic turf, paving and private fencing; quality blinds, ducted gas heating and a large reverse-cycle split-system air conditioner.
Boasting two good sized bedrooms with built-in-robes, both have easy access to the large tiled bathroom which boasts a separate bath, shower and basin. There is plenty of storage in the passage and the spacious laundry.
The back of the home is the living hub with large carpeted lounge room, separate tiled meals space and the kitchen. The kitchen has timber bench-tops, new electric oven, hot plates, dishwasher and a double-sink. There's a sliding door leading to the immaculate yard out back.
There is a single carport with auto door and sun-blinds, a lovely easy-care garden and the property is on its very own title - no body corporate! Just a lovely property in an excellent position awaiting its new owner.
